sheet.name: en
sheet.text: One more round of Portals, keys and Emeralds…
I need to get the rest of the Emeralds!
I need back to hunting down those Emeralds.
Tails has me worried…no. I’ve gotta have faith in him. I’m counting on him as much as he’s counting on me.
So much ruination…I wonder what it looked like during the Ancients’ time?
I think I’m setting a record for the number of times I’ve found the emeralds in such a short amount of time - haha!
I hope I can drop all this Cyber Energy once everyone’s safe. I’m not…feeling too great…
I wonder if it’s too late to call Rouge and ask her to steal the other Emeralds for me?
I bet Omega would’ve loved to take on those Titans.
At this point, I wouldn’t mind Shadow lending me a hand…
It’s so hot here… so why do I feel… cold?
I feel like I can almost… hear Cyber Space?
What I wouldn’t give to have Blaze’s help right about now.
Amy said the first island was barely recovering from past devastation. I get the same feeling about this place.
I bet Zavok would feel right at home here. Wonder how he’s doing? Terrible, I hope. HA!
I wonder if there’s a palace hidden inside the volcano, like on Angel Island?
